price: 27.Dheh: I tusa kuwaad Alle la wadaajiseen shuruko ahaan cibaadada, mayee (ma jiraan cid wax la wadaagta) waase Alle (Keliya), Adkaadaha Sare, Xakiimka ah.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرُونِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلۡحَقۡتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul arūniya alladhīna alḥaqtum bihi shurakāa kallā bal huwa al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
